snippet: Michael Dell wants to take his company private and retool it without quarterly earnings pressure. After Dell missed the shift to mobile, he has his work cut out for him.
abstract: Michael S Dell, fighting battle to take private the company he founded, is hoping to turn back clock on mistakes that have cost company its once-dominant position; Dell Inc largely missed out on shift to smartphones, tablets and cloud computing, errors that threaten to tarnish founder's namesake and legacy.
lead_paragraph: Michael Dell wants to take his company private and retool it without quarterly earnings pressure. After Dell missed the shift to mobile, he has his work cut out for him.

headline.main: In Battle Over Dell, a Founder Hopes to Reclaim His Legacy
headline.print_headline: In Battle Over Dell, a Founder Hopes to Reclaim His Legacy
